property.name: Text
property.value: ι After your turn begins: Play a Talent asset, reducing its cost by 1. θ Discard a Talent asset you control: Gain resources equal to that asset's printed cost. (Limit 5 resources per round.) ε effect: +0. If you succeed, gain 3 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30. Deckbulding Options: Rogue cards (ν) level 0–3, Neutral cards level 0–5, up to 10 other non-permanent Talent level 0–5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Jenny's Twin .45s, Searching for Izzie, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jenny Barnes deck only. Advanced. Uses (X ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. ι After you defeat an enemy using the above ability, exhaust Jenny's Twin .45s: Gain resources equal to that enemy's printed health.

property.name: Text
property.value: Advanced. Revelation – Attach Searching for Izzie to the location farthest from you. Attached location gets +2 shroud. ηη: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Searching for Izzie. Forced – When the game ends, if Searching for Izzie is in play: You suffer 1 mental trauma.
